name: test_e2e_with_logs[488_ENC_CMDI_DBL_002]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `ENC_CMDI_DBL_002` |
| **Name** | Double-encoded pipe whoami |
| **Category** | CMDINJ |
| **Subcategory** | double_encoded |
| **Severity** | `HIGH` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `|whoami`
- **Encoded**: `%257Cwhoami`

## Test Execution Results
